name: Erolyn Chan Fight
description: 2D side-scrolling action game。The story of mage apprentice Erolyn's first battle with the monsters is an exorcism mission given by the church that she must accomplish. Fight enemy with melee attacks and remote magic attacks,Explore the maze to find all the keys to open all hidden evil gates to destroy all the monsters.When receiving a certain level of damage, Clothes will broken.
